contentrichtext.text: {{selfref|For the Wikipedia editing policy, see [[Wikipedia:Autobiography]].}} {{Wiktionary|AB|Ab|ab}} '''AB''', '''Ab''', or '''ab''' may refer to: {{TOC right}} ==People== *"[[Able-bodied]]", used in medicine, and nautical parlance *[[Able Seaman (occupation)]], a civilian occupation *[[Able Seaman (rank)]], a naval rank *[[Airman Basic]], the lowest rank in the United States Air Force *Adult Baby, a person who practices [[paraphilic infantilism]] ==Places== *Ab, alternate name for [[Anzab-e Olya]], village in Iran *[[AB postcode area]], for Aberdeen postcode area in Scotland, UK *AB, [[Albania]] (WMO country code) *AB, [[Alberta]] (Canadian Province/Territory Code) * Air Base, used by the [[United States Air Force]] for overseas bases ==Companies, universities, organizations, and groups== *[[Activision Blizzard]], American holding company for Activision and Blizzard Entertainment. *[[American Biograph]], AB used as a film logo *[[Alfa-Beta Vassilopoulos]], a Greek supermarket chain *[[Anheuser-Busch]], the world's third largest brewing company *[[Allen-Bradley]], a line of industrial control products, manufactured by Rockwell Automation ===Company codes=== *[[Air Berlin]], IATA code *[[Akcinė bendrovė]], Lithuanian for "corporation", similar to AG, Ltd or Inc *AB, [[Aktiebolag]], Swedish for "corporation", similar to AG, Ltd or Inc *New York stock exchange symbol for [[AllianceBernstein]], a US based asset management firm ===Gangs and secret societies=== *[[Afrikaner Broederbond]], the South African secret society from 1918–1994 *[[Aryan Brotherhood]], an American gang ==Education== *A-B, [[Alderson-Broaddus College]], a liberal-arts college in West Virginia *[[Bachelor of Arts]], derived from the Latin ''artium baccalaureus'' *''[[Analecta Bollandiana]]'', academic journal ==Science, technology and mathematics== *[[Electronic amplifier#Class B and AB|AB Class amplifier]]<!--*** Title piped, as this is one place it *is* justified ***--> *Ab, The [[category of abelian groups]] ===Computing and information technology=== *ab, [[ApacheBench]], command line tool for Apache HTTP Server *[[Answerbag]], a questions and answers website ===Medicine=== *[[AB blood]], blood types in the ABO blood group system *[[Antibody]], a medical abbreviation *ab, [[Rectus abdominis muscle]], a paired stomach muscle ==Sports== *AB, [[At Bat]], baseball statistic *[[Akademisk Boldklub]], AB, a Danish professional football club *A.B., the nickname of Australian cricketer [[Allan Border]] *[[AB de Villiers]], South African middle order batsman ==Other uses== *''[[Ancienne Belgique]]'', AB, Belgian concert hall located in Brussels *AB, [[Aitareya Brahmana]] *[[Alter Bridge]], an American hard rock band *AB, [[Assembly Bill]], USA legislation type *Ab., a Hebrew abbreviation related to [[Pirkei Avot]] *ab, [[Abkhaz language]] (ISO 639 language code) ===Close resemblances and transliterations=== *[[Ab (Semitic)]], Semitic for "father" *[[A-flat (disambiguation)]] ("A{{music|flat}}"), the musical note, scale, or key *[[Av]], a month in the Hebrew calendar *Āb, Persian word for water, see [[Ap (water)]] *Aβ, [[Beta amyloid]] *[[Ab (Egyptian heart-soul concept)]], the Egyptian concept of the heart-soul ==See also== [[BA (disambiguation)]] {{Disambiguation}}
